评论概述: Comfy Different So Far So Good

I had ordered another brand and returned them immediately.  I did some more research and settled on these after they were nominated as one of the best barefoot sneaker on a review website. I received them today and absolutely LOVE them!  Use the Euro size chart for sizing. If you’re not sure, trace your foot on paper, measure it and convert the inches to the Euro size on a conversion site (Google it).Anywho… these shoes are so comfortable! I don’t even feel like I’m going to have to break them in. They have plenty of room in the toe box and there are no seams that press into my foot. I don’t have a “true” wide foot so I’m not sure if they’re actually wide or if it’s just wide in the toe box bc the middle and back of the shoe fits like a glove. I’m not a fan of the elastic laces but twirled them around and secured them so they don’t stick up on top of the shoe. It works and isn’t a deal breaker. I went out on a limb and bought the aqua blue but was a little hesitant bc they looked so bright in the pic. However, when I got them they are perfect. Yes, they’re bright but look amazing on my feet. They slip on and off easily enough and really are indeed slip resistant. They have some arch support but not a lot. If I was truly barefoot, I would have no arch support so it’s not an important feature.  I’m not sure about the durability but even if they only last 6 months, I can buy a new pair and still spend less than one pair of all other name brand sneakers.  I will definitely buy more of these shoes!  Don’t hesitate… BUY THEM!
Was misled by reviews. Not comfortable, too early to comment on durability but just don’t waste money buying this shoes.

评论概述: very comfortable shoes, will buy again
评论详情: Super comfy and durable, will buy again soon.

评论概述: New colors in the Velcro version! Yay!!
评论详情: Thank you for the new colors in the velcro version! I'm so excited! Got my first pair in May of 2019. The purple and black velcro version. Immediately got the orange. I love these shoes! I came from very expensive, built up shoes for my narrow, flat feet. Had expensive orthotics as well. Lots of lower back, hip and knee pain. Finally started getting what looked and felt like a bunion. Dr. Google suggested minimalist wide toe box shoes. Tried the joomra's and I've never looked back. I have also tried lots of different wide toe box brands that are sold here on Amazon and always had to return them. The Joomra's (aka Whitin's) with the velcro straps are the only ones that work for me. The tongue on the non velcro version is irritating. I've bought every color of the velcro version that they've had. That's why I'm so excited for the new colors. I still have and still wear the ones I bought in 2019. I rotate them weekly. Also still can't beat the price. I think they were thirty something dollars when I first bought them. Previous shoes, I was lucky if one pair was $160. $180 to $200 was the norm. Now I can get three shoes for that price. My knee and hip pain are gone. Cons: There is a learning curve to walking in them. Can't do the hard heel strike with minimalist shoes. There's also a learning curve in feeling every rock, stick and pebble. Now I don't even notice. The one downside of no padding is the bottom of my feet can be a little sore by the end of the day. My job has a concrete floor. PS- I've had to replace a couple of the insoles. The whitin store used to sell the yellow ones that come in the shoes. Now they only have a blue version that's a little different. I'll have to see how they work out. Also, try toe socks- game changer.
Believe the hype. These barefoot sneakers are incredibly comfortable. Feel just like walking barefoot but with protection and stability.

评论概述: Light weight and gives me better balance.
评论详情: I bought these for work. I have neuropathy in my feet from chemotherapy. My feet get incredible hot.  These are lightweight. My feet do not melt in them and I feel that has helped with my neuropathy. I have better balance with these, vs running sneakers. They are true to size and because of the design. The toe box has more room for your toes. They have good traction inside. A little slippery on snow. I am not sure how they would be on wet rocks..
No support, good traction, I would wear at the lake or on a boat but i wouldn't use them for anything else

评论概述: Walking as your feet were intended to do!
评论详情: Size was perfect!  The wide toe box allow my toes from feeling cramped.  They are strong and lightweight, slip resistant minimalist shoes that are comfortable to wear on long walks.

I bought the red shoes and they are very pretty.  I love the color!  These shoes are also very comfortable. I did a 110 jumping jacks wearing these shoes and then I ran a mile. I wanted to see how my legs and feet would feel the next day and all was well. I will do a longer run with them on today and see how my legs and feet feel tomorrow. So far these have worked out very very well.

Very stretchy fabric allows foot to move sideways over sole edge, foot move forward so feels too short. There is No toe separation inside the shoe!! Only carved into outside of sole- so that "feature " is non existent. The toe box is wider but that only allows foot to slide side to side as you walk. OK for at home, indoors- not good for run, walk outside , or all day at work- has no arch support. I returned these.

I love the shoe. Great design! I got the 7.5 - 8. I am a size 8 and these could be a tiny bit bigger. Also, the color! On Amazon they look like a soft pink. In reality, they are closer to the color of Pepto Bismol. I like them, anyway. Keepers, but just barely.
Comfy to my toes.  Love the fit around ankles.

Extremely comfortable

I used these shoes once outside and a couple of times indoors on a treadmill.  I am a seasoned marathon runner and I own around 25 pairs of different runners, that are all in use.  I strongly believe, that alternating different types of running shoes on a daily basis, helps me to prevent injuries. Every pair of shoes, trains, my feet in different ways. They all have different cushioning, different heel to toe and different toe boxes, that challenge the muscles in my feet, legs…in different ways.  The Joomra minimalist shoes should be used sparingly to begin with, to give yourself time to get used to the different pounding of your feet.  I am not sure I would use these shoes for trail running. They have next to no cushioning, zero ankle support and I am not sure that I would trust the sole should I hit a sharp stone.  Nevertheless, for harmless, flat trails or for occasional street runs they are a good addition to other running shoes.  I like the best for treadmill running.

Oh such comfort is found in wearing this shoe.  At 78 (F) I've never had such a cumfy shoe on these little high arched feet.  So appreciate this product - I have 3 pairs hoping they'll last me for the rest of my days.
Super comfortable and durable. I have flat, wide feet and they fit like a glove. Will be buying another pair!
Material is stiff and bunchy

No cushion really but very comfortable and easy to put on doesn’t squeeze my foot in any way like walking barefoot I use them to work out but if you have flat feet like me not good for walking
Good price, they don’t slip off of your foot. Very comfortable, nice looking a variety of colors, and sizes.

评论概述: Lots of space for my little piggies
评论详情: I bought these to wear to work; I'm a veterinary technician and I spend most of my day standing, scurrying, bending, kneeling and squatting. I also have plantar fascitis and my toes sometimes feel crunchy, for lack of a better word. It took about a week for my feet to acclimate to these shoes and it was worth it! I've been wearing them for over a month and I can feel my feet getting stronger! No blisters and breaking them in was fairly painless, but know that it will take time for your dogs to stop barking if you've never worn this style of show before. I love that they are easy to slide on and off, they are true to size, and I think they are definitely ugly-cute. The soles are durable and flexible, I would purchase these again.
These barefoot shoes are very comfortable! Fit perfectly.

评论概述: One legged and can finally walk without pain!
评论详情: Thank you so much for these shoes! Yes I’m an amputee for the past 41 yrs and rely on the good leg to walk normally. Now with the years gone by I have gotten a bunion, corns, and awful pain when walking. Second toe overlaps my big toe, have worn tennis shoes but still hurts, I’d even acquire blisters! Tried them on and my foot felt like I was on a cloud! Best part when I took off shoe, my toes were all flat on ground and straight, even the bunion was smaller! Hope it stays this way, I so will pass this info onto an amputee group I’m in . People of your feet hurt, it’s worth trying, I know I’m getting more pairs
Feet get hot. Makes me feel hot all over. Only would wear on cold days.

I love these shoes! They offer just enough support to keep you climbing and hiking. The vents allow for easy drying if they get wet, and the sinches make it more convenient than laces. the best part is that it allows my foot to be just that!

评论概述: Where Have You Been All My Life?
评论详情: I hate wearing shoes. I live shoes, but I want them to feel like I'm not wearing shoes. I want them to be cute and cozy, but useful in case I need to run or climb something.  These shoes are everything and more.  And PURPLE! YOU GUYS. Dark, beautiful, purple.  I might buy 50 more so I can always have them for the rest of my life.  Bunion pain? NOPE! Planter Fasceitius? Never heard of it. Arches? Supported. Long walks? Perfect. Off road? Yep!  Love these shoes. I hope they last forever.

评论详情: I like these wide toe box shoes and use them almost every day. They work well for walking longer distances as well,  which was the reason I originally purchased them.  There's not much cushioning in this type of shoe, so I add a shoe insert for extra comfort. Overall I like these shoes especially as they're an affordable choice!
I love my 5 finger minimalist barefoot toe shoes, but the cost... these are a great alternative,  and my feet stay dryer, even on wet pavement.
I love these so much.  I will definitely get them in another color. Really comfortable and I've worn them all day .
my son likes these. you can still where socks. it’s not like your toe goes in to each hole or anything.

I have bought other brands of similar shoes but these are the best ones!! The quality difference to my previous pairs was obvious as soon as I picked this pair up. The fit well and are very comfortable. I think these will be very durable and last quite awhile

I ordered a 7.5-8. Normally I wear 7.5 so I figured these would have the space I needed if they run small, however these were still too small and tight making them uncomfortable. I had asked to return them for a larger size because I have been looking forward to trying these shoes out. I was given two "free" options to return it.. I could PAY for pick up or have them dropped off for free which was pretty funny. I just had surgery so I can't drive which made finding a way to drop them off difficult but paying to return them isn't a big deal since I'd get the correct size in the end. I received my replacement order and turns out I was given the same size. Kind of a waste of time at this point so I will just give them away.  These have been sitting in my cart for awhile so it really does suck that it didn't work out. In this case I got what I paid for. It's hard to give advice since most reviews seem to be mixed and some sizing depends on the colour you order, but maybe size up and go from there. Be prepared to send them back multiple times if the sizing IS off.
Wore them to aerobics and zumba classes. They are comfortable and flexible
Edtos tenis super bellos y comodos
Super comfy, wide toe bed for my 72 yr old toes!!!! I bought these fr casual wear and they fit the bill. True to size for me!
Still using daily for strength training! I even wore them once for a 10K. Easy to change out shoes too if you do bike cardio/strength bootcamps.
Great barefoot shoe. Nice wide toe area. Lightweight and airy. Easy to wash. My favorite, and I’ve purchased 4 brands.

I purchased a different brand of minimalist shoes a few years ago, and they were amazing. Pretty much the most comfortable shoes I'd ever bought, and I wore them hiking, kayaking, rock climbing...until one day they finally died on me. The company no longer makes the style, so I was looking for an alternative, and thought these would be it, but they SO are not. I've worn these a couple of times hoping maybe they would get broken in a little but I still hate them. They are very stiff & not comfortable at all to wear. I don't know how these are getting good reviews. The back part of the shoe that meets the Achilles tendon rubs so much, I actually took these shoes off in the middle of a hike and preferred to walk back to the car barefoot & stepping on rocks, sticks, and pine cones because it was less torture than wearing these shoes. The sizing is correct, but still somehow these shoes feel "wrong" on my feet. My husband also purchased a pair and he threw his away, he was so annoyed with them. I would honestly not recommend these shoes if you are planning to do anything else in them besides sit somewhere & look cute. These are not utilitarian, so don't waste your money like we did. Very disappointed on the quality of items from Amazon lately, I feel like it is now mostly an overseas knockoff swap meet vs the convenient online retailer it used to be.

Well I used these on the treadmill not really thinking it was a good idea and was amazed at how great my feet felt! Not sore at all, I'm ordering a second pair and wear them constantly now. Love them!!
Pleasantly pleased with the fit of these shoes provides additional space for my wife’s toes. She is very happy.

My wife loves these shoes so much she asked for 2 more pair for Christmas.  Before getting these shoes her feet hurt, her toes were cramped, and it hurt to walk. Now, with the help of these shoes and a pair of inserts, she is almost pain free. Thank you.
